name: Cycling Spirit 2013
description:
Action, simulation and tactical cycling race game - Road race exclusively.

Each game lasts only a few minutes as you take control of your bike only a few kilometers before the end of the race.
Just swipe the screen to control your rider on the road, but you will have to be smart to win the race and use correctly your rider's energy.
A full tutorial is included to help you learn the game and become a real cyclist..

- With Cycling Spirit 2013, try to win classics like Milan-San Remo, Paris-Roubaix, Ronde van Vlaanderen, Liège Bastogne Liège, Tour de Romandie, Classica San Sebastian or il Giro di Lombardia.
- With Cycling Spirit 2013, try to win stage events like the Tour Down Under, Paris-Nice, Tirreno-Adriatico, Volta Ciclista a Catalunya, Tour de Romandie, il Giro d'Italia, Le Tour de France, Le Criterium du Dauphiné, Vuelta a España (Tour of Spain) or even the Tour of Beijing...

Version 2014 coming late in the season.

Absolutely no ad, no specific rights, but we advise you to connect with google play services to send your best scores and compare them with other riders. Yes, some cycling races seems very difficult, but some players succeed, that's cycling sport... now it is your turn on the bicycle !
